name: Geometric
description:
Make math shapes and curves.

Choose from Polar Rose, Trigonometric functions, Polygons, Spirals of different kinds, Superellipse, Astroid and modify multiple parameters to get complex shapes with ease.

- Make complex patterns with ease.
- Control parameters to customize the math shape.
- Many interesting math shapes to be added in future.

Follow us on Twitter @mathscapes.

Known Issue
- The vector path in the case of Trigonometric functions and Spirals connects the first and the last point. This edge may be manually deleted now. It'll be fixed soon.
